definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: Don’t overindulge in the comforts of home.
sentences.chinese: 不要过度放纵在家里的安逸中。

sentences.english: They turned down or gave up comfort and wealth in order to fight for what is right.
sentences.chinese: 他们拒绝或放弃安逸与富有，为正义而斗争。

sentences.english: For ease in the future, you will also need to adjust the Pivot Point.
sentences.chinese: 因为安逸未来，你也将会调整枢点。

sentences.english: Whee! Now, we are all going for a ride.
sentences.chinese: 现在，我有了一个安逸的新家。

sentences.english: As a river in the sea, work finds its perfection in the depth of leisure.
sentences.chinese: 犹如江河融入沧海，劳动于安逸中求得完美。

sentences.english: So, I feel comfortable advocating frugality.
sentences.chinese: 所以，提倡节俭使我感觉到安逸。

sentences.english: I’d be better off without the incident on my mind.
sentences.chinese: 要是没有这件事情在心头我就更安逸了。

sentences.english: The quiet home life and peaceful happiness of Bleak Hills passed before his imagination.
sentences.chinese: 他脑海中浮现出童山的幽静生活和安逸的家庭幸福。

sentences.english: Don’t let your enemy drain resources from auxiliary sites without a fi ght!
sentences.chinese: 不要让你的敌人安逸地在分矿采集资源。

sentences.english: Pig people constantly sacrifice their own happiness and comfort for the sake of somebody else.
sentences.chinese: 为了他人，属猪的人会不惜牺牲自己的幸福和安逸。

sentences.english: Furthermore, drinking in such easeful light is really a kind of enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 在那种安逸的灯光下喝酒的确是一种享受。

sentences.english: One dieth in his full strength, being wholly at ease and quiet.
sentences.chinese: 有人至死身体强壮，尽得平靖安逸。

sentences.english: It takes a while for Leos Carax to get comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 这需要一段狮子座苔享受安逸。

sentences.english: He is unsparing of his own peace and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 他不吝惜自己的安逸舒适。

sentences.english: Among those nations you will find no repose, no resting place for the sole of your foot.
sentences.chinese: 在那些国中，你必不得安逸，也不得落脚之地。

sentences.english: There the prisoners rest together; they hear not the voice of the oppressor.
sentences.chinese: 被囚的人同得安逸，不听见督工的声音。

definition: Anning District of Lanzhou City 蘭州市|兰州市[Lan2 zhou1 Shi4], Gansu/Anning City, to the west of Kunming 昆明[Kun1 ming2], Yunnan
to stand aloof from worldly affairs
to take things as they are (idiom)/to leave a situation as it is/to be happy with the status quo
